articles.title: Ministers call for defence spending of 2.5% of GDP
articles.description: Two senior Conservatives publicly call on Rishi Sunak to increase spending to counter global risks.
articles.content:
Two ministers have publicly urged the government to increase defence spending to above 2.5% of national income.
Anne-Marie Trevelyan and Tom Tugendhat said the UK needed to "lead the way" and invest… [+2023 chars]
